mapper.select: select customerid, cname as name, email, tel, addr, district, city, province from customer
select customerid, cname as name, email, tel, addr, district, city, province from customer where customerid = #{customerId}
select customerid, cname as name, email, tel, addr, district, city, province from customer where cname = #{name}
select customer.customerid, cname as name, email, tel, addr, district, city, province from customer, orders where customer.customerid = orders.customerid and orderid = #{orderId}

select customerid, cname as name, email, tel, addr, district, city, province from customer where 1 = 1
and concat(customerid,',',cname,',',email,',',tel,',',addr,',',district,',',city,',',province) like concat ('%', #{keyword},'%')

select customerid, cname as name, email, tel, addr, district, city, province from customer where 1 = 1
and concat(addr,',',district,',',city,',',province) like concat ('%', #{addr},'%')
